titleStmt.title: By the King. A proclamation to restraine the transportation of corne, vvooll, vvooll-fells, fullers earth, and leather.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.

publicationStmt.publisher: by Robert Barker, printer to the Kings most Excellent Maiestie: and by the assignes of Iohn Bill,

notesStmt.note: Dated at end: Hampton Court, the last day of September, in the eighth yeere of Our Reigne.
Arms 21 (with C R at the top); Steele notation: the nesse 2) hath 3) to of.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
